about_the_game:
The first chapter of the visual novel Devastated Path will introduce you to the characters and world of the game. In addition to the story, the game will feature optional choices and secret abilities that will allow you to change the path of game.



The life of an ordinary freelance programmer Romero, whose existence is swallowed up by darkness. The guy finds himself in the center of intricate events that he will have to unravel to save his life. As the story unfolds, the characters' trust and relationships are destroyed, and the line between reality and illusion blurs. When the police department's investigation comes to a standstill, it's up to you to connect the dots, uncover ulterior motives, and ultimately uncover the truth. Is Romero really behind these events, or is he just an unwitting pawn in a much bigger game?

content_descriptors.notes: Adult themes take center stage in this game. The game world is full of violence, murder, depicted in a realistic and disturbing manner, where profanity is the norm and psychological problems are common. The narrative is about drug use, substance abuse and its consequences, as well as crime scene investigations with gruesome images of death.
